items.summary: Replace the current single-message homepage hero banner (HeroSection) with a scrollable banner/slider that shows multiple distinct banners, one per slide, with swipe/drag support on touch devices and clickable navigation controls on desktop.

Implement the following banner copy as separate slides in the homepage hero slider, ensuring each slide has: Headline, Subheadline, Supporting Line, and one or two CTA buttons exactly as provided (English text). Include the optional 4th banner as an additional slide.

Wire the hero slider CTA buttons to existing site behaviors/routes: (1) any "Book…"/"Schedule…" strategy-call CTA must trigger the existing strategy call behavior (bookStrategyCall). (2) "Explore the CONTROL™ Framework" must scroll to the existing homepage section with id="framework". (3) Any non-strategy-call CTAs that are not scroll actions must navigate using the app’s existing client-side routing style (pushState + popstate) to appropriate existing routes (e.g., /process for "Start Your Transformation" and "See How We Work", /contact for "Request Founder Blueprint™" and "Evaluate Your Systems").

Add accessibility and motion-safe behavior to the hero slider: support keyboard navigation (left/right), provide ARIA labeling for slide controls, ensure focus styles are visible, and respect prefers-reduced-motion (disable autoplay/animated transitions if implemented).
